channel.title: Bowl Of Bytes
channel.description: Recent content on Bowl Of Bytes

item.title: Setting up a VPN with WireGuard
item.description: In my quest of building a homelab I wanted to set up a VPN to access my internal network from anywhere. Read on to see how I’ve set this up with Wireguard.

item.title: Manually upgrading a Raspberry Pi 2
item.description: I needed to dust off my trusty Raspberry Pi 2 for a new project, only to discover its Raspbian version was ancient history. With no SD-card reader in sight, I took the road less traveled: a manual upgrade adventure.
